servant.name: Gilgamesh

nP.name: Enuma Elish (The Star of Creation that Split Heaven and Earth)
nP.desc: Deals damage to all enemies. (+) (Activates first) Increase own NP damage by 30% for 1 turn.

activeSkill: Increases party's attack for 3 turns.
Increases own NP generation rate for 3 turns.
Increases own critical star absorption for 3 turns. (+) Charges own NP gauge.

bondCE.name: Key of the King's Law
bondCE.effect: Increases own NP damage by 30%. 30% Chance to increase own critical damage by 10% for 3 turns when attacking.

servant.name: James Moriarty

nP.name: The Dynamics of an Asteroid (The Ultimate Crime)
nP.desc: Deals damage to one enemy. Reduces their defense for 3 turns. (Activates first)

activeSkill: Ignores Invincibility for 1 turn. Increases own critical star absorption for 1 turn.
Charges own NP gauge. Increases own NP damage by 20% for 3 turns. [Demerit] Consumes 10 critical stars.
Increases party's attack for 3 turns. Further increases the attack of allies with Evil Alignment except himself for 3 turns.

bondCE.name: The Dynamics of an Asteroid
bondCE.effect: Increases the NP damage of Evil allies by 25% when he is on the field.

servant.name: Okita Souji

nP.name: Mumyou Sandan-Zuki (Lightless, Three-Stage Thrust)
nP.desc: Deals damage to one enemy. (Activates first) Reduces their defense for 3 turns.

activeSkill: Increases own Quick performance for 1 turn.
Increases own critical star absorption for 1 turn.
Grants self Evasion for 1 turn. Increases own critical damage for 3 turns.

bondCE.name: 8th-rank Headband of Resolution
bondCE.effect: Increases party's critical damage by 25% while she is on the field.

servant.name: Sigurd

nP.name: Bolverk Gram (Heaven's Wheel of Destruction)
nP.desc: Deals damage to one enemy. Deals extra damage to Dragon enemies.

activeSkill: Increases own critical damage for 3 attacks, 3 turns.
Increases own Buster performance for 1 turn. Grants self Guts status for 1 time, 3 turns. (Revived with 1000 HP.)
Increases one ally's critical star generation rate for 1 turn. Grants them Debuff Immunity for 1 turn.

bondCE.name: True - Congealed Wisdom
bondCE.effect: Increases party's Buster performance by 10% and critical damage by 15% while he is on the field.

servant.name: Brynhildr

nP.name: Brynhildr Romantia (Until Death Divide the Two Apart)
nP.desc: Deals damage to one enemy. Increases party's critical star generation rate by 30%->(+)50% for 3 turns. Deals extra damage to Brynhildr's Beloved enemies.

activeSkill: Increases own Buster performance for 1 turn. Increases own NP damage for 1 turn.
Reduces one enemy's critical attack chance for 3 turns. Reduces their NP damage for 1 turn.
Increases one ally's critical star absorption for 3 turns. (+) Increases their critical damage for 3 turns. Recovers their HP.

bondCE.name: Imperishable Flames
bondCE.effect: Increases party's Buster performance and NP generation rate by 10% while she is on the field.

servant.name: Scheherazade

nP.name: Alf Layla wa-Layla (One Thousand and One Nights)
nP.desc: Increases own NP damage by 20% for 1 turn (Activates first). Deals damage to all enemies. Deals extra damage to King enemies. (+) 500% Chance to reduce their debuff resistance by 50% for 1 time, 3 turns.

activeSkill: Chance to reduce one enemy's NP gauge by 1. Increases own Arts performance for 1 turn.
Chance to Charm all Male enemies for 1 turn. Increases own defense for 2 turns.
Grants self Guts status for 1 time, 5 turns. Reduces one King enemy's attack for 1 turn. (+) Grants party Guts status except herself for 1 time, 2 turns. (Revives with 500 HP.)

servant.name: Osakabehime

nP.name: Hakuro Jyou no Hyakki Hachitendou-sama (Lord Hachitendo of the White Egret Castle's Hundred Demons)
nP.desc: Increases party's Max HP for 3 turns. Defenseup Increases party's defense by 20% for 3 turns. Increases party's Quick performance for 3 turns.

activeSkill: Increases own defense for 3 turns. Further increases own defense by 30% for 1 turn. Increases own debuff resistance for 3 turns.
Charges one ally's NP gauge. Increases their critical star generation rate for 3 turns.
Reduces one enemy's defense for 1 turn. Removes their buffs.
passiveSkill: Increases own critical star generation rate by 8%. [Demerit] Reduces own debuff resistance by 10%.

bondCE.name: Princess' Origami
bondCE.effect: Increases party's NP generation rate by 15% while she is on the field.
